GUI.src

Class Raum

  • java.lang.Object
    • GUI.src.Raum

  • public class Raum
extends java.lang.Object
    The Raum class contains all the variables for a room (such as Licht, Modul and Klima), as well as a constructor.
    Author:
    MinhMax
